feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Custom Shutdown Dialog 1.0.0
entry.content:
Custom Shutdown Dialog

Override the classic shutdown dialog in Explorer which is invoked with ALT+F4 with your own program.

This mod will only work on Windows 10 or greater and Windhawk v1.4 or greater.

entry.title: Classic Menus 1.0.0
entry.content:
Classic Menus

In Windows XP, menus remained unthemed even with themes enabled. This mod replicates that functionality.

This mod will only work on Windhawk v1.4 and greater.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Eradicate Immersive Menus 1.0.0
entry.content:
Eradicate Immersive Menus

Gets rid of immersive menus system-wide. This mod should work on every Windows 10 version, from 1507 all the way up to 22H2. However, this mod will only work on Windhawk v1.4 and greater.

Preview

From left to right: Explorer, Taskbar, Explorer (classic), Taskbar (classic)

Before:

After:

Common problems

Freezing

This mod will take a while to load on the first run, and if you disable and then enable it while your system is all already up and running with many software open.

Stuck on "Initializing…"

If ever a certain process gets stuck on "Initializing…", and the "Mod tasks in progress" window does not go away, restart Windhawk. If that does not work, simply add it to the exclusion list in the Advanced tab of this mod.

entry.title: Message Box Fix 1.4.6
entry.content: • Add option to fix background color for pre-Windows Vista classic theme look

entry.title: Explorer 32px Icons 1.0.0
entry.content:
Explorer 32px Icons

Beginning with Windows Vista, the "Medium icons" view (previous just "Icons") uses icons that are 48 pixels in size, instead of the previous 32 pixel size. This mod restores the 32 pixel size.

This mod will only work on Windhawk v1.4 and greater.

IMPORTANT

You must be using Explorer with the SysListView32 view enabled for this mod to work. The default DirectUI view will not work.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Notepad Clientedge 1.0.0
entry.content:
Notepad Clientedge

In a Windows 10 update, the WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE style was removed from Notepad's edit control, resulting in an inaccurate appearance on classic theme or other themes of old Windows versions. This mod adds that back.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Classic Conhost 1.0.0
entry.content:
Classic Conhost

This mod will apply classic theme and optionally client edge to console windows.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Fix Darkmode ListViews 1.0
entry.content:
Fixes ListViews in dark mode, and outside of it

With:

entry.title: Better Taskbar Autohide 1.2
entry.content: • Fix: When closing a window with notifications before delay, the taskbar will not be hidden immediately

entry.title: Fix PPEE/ResourceHacker Wow64 filesystem redirection 1.2
entry.content: Update to be less brittle, and also work for ResourceHacker

entry.title: Classic Explorer navigation bar 1.0
entry.content:
Classic Explorer navigation bar

Restores the classic Explorer navigation bar to the version before the Windows 11 "Moments 4" update. Among other things, that makes drag and drop work again.

Note: You may need to restart Explorer to apply the changes.

The new Windows "Moments 4" update version:

After installing this mod, with the "Classic navigation bar" configuration:

After installing this mod, with the "Classic ribbon UI (no tabs)" configuration:

entry.title: Fix Classic Theme Maximized Windows 1.2
entry.content: Fix non-fully maximized windows. Namely open/save dialogs, which maximize but do not fill screen.

entry.title: Fix Classic Theme Maximized Windows 1.1
entry.content:
• Fixed bugs with DWM injection by excluding the mod from injecting into system processes.
  • Fixed bugs with switching maximised applications to fullscreen mode (i.e. YouTube videos in web browser).
  • Improved mod uninit routine to remove the clip from all affected windows.

entry.title: Classic Desktop Icons 1.2.1
entry.content: • Add option to force non-translucent selection rectangle

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.1.5
entry.content: • Fixed an overflow regression for a centered taskbar for Windows 11 22H2 before update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update). The bug was introduced in version 1.1.4.

entry.title: Fix PPEE Wow64 filesystem redirection 1.0
entry.content:
Fix Wow64 filesystem redirection for PPEE

When loading a file from C:\Windows\System32, PPEE would automatically be redirected to C:\Windows\SysWOW64.

This mod disables that redirection, so that the correct file is loaded.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Better Taskbar Autohide 1.1
entry.content:
• Support Windows 11
  • Fix image URL in readme

entry.title: Better Taskbar Autohide 1.0
entry.content:
Better Taskbar Autohide

Windows taskbar is forced to show at the top when there are notifications for inactive windows and auto-hide enabled, which can cover something. This module allows the taskbar to be shown for a while and then re-hidden.

entry.title: Taskbar Clock Customization 1.3.2
entry.content: • Fixed clock with seconds precision issue for some Windows 11 versions.

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.1.4
entry.content: • Initial fixes for the incompatibility with Windows 11 22H2 update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update). There are still known bugs, but it's mostly usable.
